author: Mike H
content: It helps to come late to these topics, as everyone has clearly expressed thoughts on style and I find myself agreeing with which ever one I'm reading. There is truth in all points of view. Perhaps style is a longer view, maybe in 50 or 100 years when digital photography has morphed into something completely different people will look at our images and say that's an "Andreas" or a "Ted" because the work was excellent and has survived as lesser work did not. So maybe style has more to do with creative excellence than good repetition.
